issue.title: "Support bundle" download #5142

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

issue.body: ### Purpose To add a button, "SupportBundle", on GUI that downloads some info for a support people. Issue number #5142 ### Testing None. ### Screenshots SupportBundle button added under Actions section. Clicking SupportBundle button makes two things. First one is open a window to saveas zip file and the second is save same zip file under the Syncthing base folder under the created support_bundle folder. Zip file named as support_bundle + timestamp Under the saved zip there are 4 files. (The files will be added for further needs) ## Authorship git config --global user.name "Bahadir Yilmaz" git config --global user.email "bahadiryilmaz@yahoo.com"

issue.title: Display historic resource usage in the UI

labels.name: enhancement
labels.description: New features or improvements of some kind, as opposed to a problem (bug)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

issue.body:
Feature Request: 
Today Syncthing UI provides  data for Download&Upload Rate, RAM&CPU Utilization, however this info is not visualized historically.  My Suggestion is to have a line chart for each item on this menu.   For example: Clicking on Download Rate(drop down menu) can show a line chart showing the rate for the last 10 min.  I am aware that there are many other tools out there for monitoring. Therefore my suggestion is not to create another one but instead showing a real time  line chart only for last X min.  This is to help troubleshooting an ongoing issue. Such as: oh my network connectivity is slow for the last couple of minutes, is it Syncthing consuming too much bandwidth?  


This can be like the Kubernetes Dashboard(that also provides for only the last 15 min)

![opera snapshot_2018-08-31_204117_www google se](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9316467/44930338-4b7fd500-ad5e-11e8-8aa9-be98a3ab210f.png)

Thanks,
/Eser
